name: Nejire Hado (MHA)
description:
LoRA model with the objective of representing Nejire Hado from MHA, the trigger word is Nejire Hado. Should work with most anime models

Recommended configuration: <lora:nejire:0.9>
EasyNegative embedding was used for negative prompts

While the model is capable of reproducing Nejire Hado by itself, if you are looking for a specific outfit (such as her hero suit) you need a few keywords to be able to reproduce it correctly

School uniform: white shirt, school uniform, red tie, u.a. school uniform
Cheerleader uniform: u.a. cheerleader uniform, orange shirt, orange skirt, pom pom \(cheerleading\), pink footwear
Hero suit: bodysuit, drill hair, yellow gloves

Configuration used for the example images:

  • Sampler: DDIM

  • CFG: 7

  • Steps 20

  • Widht: 512

  • Height: 728

  • Hires fix:

    • Upscaler: Latent (nearest)

    • Hires steps: 63

    • Denoising strength: 0.53

    • Upscaled by: 2

The images come in pairs, one where the hires fix is applied and one where it is not.

meta.prompt: <lora:nejire-final:0.9>, nejire hado, white shirt, school uniform, outdoors, intricate, beautiful, highly detailed, artstation, concept art, smooth, 1girl, smile, open mouth, looking at viewer, from side, red tie, blush, arms behind back, u.a. school uniform,
